content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in grosseto on october 9 2015 the case involved the division of community property inheritance and lasted for 17 years from 1998 to 2015 the parties involved were referred to as sg sc and sa the court made a final decision based on an experts report assigning specific lots to each party the court also acknowledged any remaining movable claims listed in the report sg was ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings including professional fees and general expenses the courts decision was made on october 9 2015 and filed on the same day
